{{{
[client]
default-character-set=utf8
socket=/var/tmp/mysql.sock
port=3306

[mysqld]
character-set-server=utf8
basedir=/usr/local/mysql
datadir=/var/lib/mysql/data
log-error=/var/log/mysqld.log
socket=/var/tmp/mysql.sock
port=3306
user=mysql

[mysql.server]
basedir=/usr/local/mysql

[mysqld_safe]
log-error=/var/log/mysqld.log
}}}
